# JavaScript dasturlash tili
Ushbu bobda biz JavaScript-ni noldan boshlab o’rganamiz va OAD (OOP) kabi ilg’or konsepsiyalarga o’tamiz.
Birinchi bo’limda biz tilning o’ziga e’tibor qaratamiz, bu yerda JavaScript-ni ishlatilayotgan muhit haqida esa minimal ma’lumotlar mavjud.
1.  [Kirish bobi](https://uz.javascript.info/getting-started)
2.  [JavaScript asoslari](https://uz.javascript.info/first-steps)
3.  [Kod sifati](https://uz.javascript.info/code-quality)
4.  [Ob'ektlar: asoslar](https://uz.javascript.info/object-basics)
5.  [Ma'lumot turlari](https://uz.javascript.info/data-types)
6.  [Funktsiyalar bilan ilg'or ishlash](https://uz.javascript.info/advanced-functions)
7.  [Obyekt xususiyatlarini sozlash](https://uz.javascript.info/object-properties)
8.  [Prototiplar, meros](https://uz.javascript.info/prototypes)
9.  [Klasslar](https://uz.javascript.info/classes)
10.  [Xatolarni qayta ishlash](https://uz.javascript.info/error-handling)
11.  [Promislar, async/await](https://uz.javascript.info/async)
12.  [Generatorlar, rivojlangan iteratsiya](https://uz.javascript.info/generators-iterators)
13.  [Modullar](https://uz.javascript.info/modules)
14.  [Boshqalar](https://uz.javascript.info/js-misc)
[Keyingi dars](https://uz.javascript.info/getting-started)
